Windlord::

Before Windlord left the room, he looked towards Rodimus and 
said "I'm afraid that I can't tell you so much about Triped... 'cause 
I just arrived to their base and have a small chat with a Triped's 
member" in few words Windlord told him what had chatted with Naga, 
what Nagah had explained a little about Triped's goals (Defeat 
Preds), that Triped's are a Pred's faction, the hidden menace that 
Nagah had given him, and how Nagah lat him go. "I don't sure what do 
you think but he was in good mood these day or he was a little 
fool, 'cause he let me go... That's all that I can tell you about"

Windlord waited that ROdimus said that he could left the room
